attributes.action: scrap the act of union as its null and void and give scotland it rightful independance?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a scottish citizen and not a so called "british (english) citizen" i want the government to give scotland independance as the act of union was not signed by the scottish people and never will as a result should be null and void

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
